name: Track Skips with GTS platform
short_description:
Since mid 2010, AgoraBee is using the GTS platform to track skips under the name ChisFleet®, containers and more generally mobile assets in Switzerland using our Active RFID products. 
With more than 15'000 devices tracked, we believe that our solution respond to a real market demand today. Please feel free to ask any questions. We are looking to expand our base of partners using GTS World Wide. 
Catch the train with us and our current 15 integrators throughout Europe, Americas and the Middle East!!!
summary: Track skips and container with the GTS platform adapted in Switzerland
